quote: I had to trick people into giving me money for my first film. Making a romantic comedy is easier and more expected from a woman than it is to make a drama about a Japanese warrior.

quote: There's a hardening of the culture. Reality TV has lowered the standards of entertainment. You're left wondering about the legitimacy of relationships. It's probably harder to entertain the same people with a more classic form of writing, and romantic comedies are a classic genre.

quote: A man's ability to haggle is never a turn-on. The only thing less romantic than how much you paid is how much you saved. The last thing we want to hear is how you talked the jeweler down on our new earrings.

quote: What Romantic terminology called genius or talent or inspiration is nothing other than finding the right road empirically, following one's nose, taking shortcuts.

quote: When I was a teenager I was a total romantic escapist. My world was books.

quote: Somebody called me a 'bruised romantic' once, and I like that.

quote: Maybe I'm naively romantic, but I do believe that spice and excitement doesn't stop once a couple gets together.

quote: Truthfully, I almost avoided 'While You Were Sleeping,' because I find those romantic comedies kind of precious, and they're full of lines that leave you feeling a little bewildered when you say them.
name: Bill Pullman

quote: I want to do more action adventures and more romantic comedies.

quote: I heard this music coming out of the radio and it was 'Ain't Nobody's Business.' It got me. I thought, 'I can do this.' I decided just like that. No romantic story.

quote: Romantic music really stirs my soul. And, of course, I love Chinese music it makes me feel closer to home.

quote: I'm a very loyal boyfriend. I'm a bit of a joker... I can be romantic, but not too sickly.

quote: I know it's hard to blame the time, but there's a bit of an expectation for a summer movie. I think that 'Superman Returns' was a bit nostalgic and romantic, and I don't think that was what people were expecting, especially in the summer.

quote: I'm very romantic. I've emptied flower shops.

quote: I'm a very romantic and passionate guy.

quote: The first book I wrote was The Bride Price which was a romantic book, but my husband burnt the book when he saw it. I was the typical African woman, I'd done this privately, I wanted him to look at it, approve it and he said he wouldn't read it.

quote: In the West, audiences think I am a stereotyped action star, or that I always play hitmen or killers. But in Hong Kong, I did a lot of comedy, many dramatic films, and most of all, romantic roles, lots of love stories. I was like a romance novel hero.

quote: I love romantic comedies.
name: Lil' Romeo

quote: After these three novels I gave up writing novels for a time I was dissatisfied with romantic doom, yet didn't see much way around it.

quote: I think a nice romantic dinner should be saved for when you and the girl you're dating or seeing have something special and it's a more special occasion.

quote: It seems to me that romantic comedies used to be about falling in love, but in recent years they've really become just comedies where the love story is only there as a spine to hang the jokes on.
name: Nigel Cole

quote: There were two sides to David Lean: on the one side, he was kind of a rather stiff, disciplined Englishman. And then he had this kind of romantic side to him. I think being true to both sides of your nature is important.

quote: Scotsmen are metaphisical and emotional, they are sceptical and mystical, they are romantic and ironic, they are cruel and tender, and full of mirth and despair.

name: Janet Street-Porter

quote: I am not an adolescent, nor a romantic. I analyze objectively.

quote: There's something about marriage that is not as intensely romantic or interesting as a couple's first meeting.

quote: I get some of my ideas from watching my three daughters, but most of them come from my own memories of growing up. I can remember how romantic I was, not just about love, but romance in the classic sense - the romantic ideals: of honor and truth, of loyalty, sacrifice and fairness. Those were the elements that made a story satisfying to me.

quote: I'm getting a lot of uninteresting romantic lead guys that look good and fall in love sort of garbage.

name: Anne Boyd

quote: So I'm still in my romantic stage with London, I love it as a place.
name: Christian Cooke

quote: The whole westward expansion myth is seen as romantic. But it's a joke, a blot on American history.

quote: I want to do all kinds of things. I want to do some comedy. I'd love to do a romantic comedy, and I'd love to do some period pieces with classical text. I'd love somebody to cast me as Macbeth, but for a film. I just want to be all over the place.
